implementation_summary: Added copy_with(**changes) method to Todo dataclass that returns a new Todo instance with specified field changes while preserving the original. Uses dataclasses.replace() internally and automatically updates the updated_at timestamp.
acceptance_criteria_met: New instance's updated_at is automatically updated
risks_limitations: No validation on text field changes (allows empty text via copy_with, consistent with original constructor behavior)
